review: This is a great little device. I don't have cable so all I need is my internet access and I can watch most of my favorite shows and movies. I did end up using the LAN rather then the WiFi because it seems to stream better plus not having a cable provider limited some of my watching ( like trying to watch the World Cup on ESPN) but I do use an over the air HDTV antenna which gives me all the network channels that I need.
